underlying_goal: Implement an automated daily job to synchronize secrets.
primary_success: Correctly understanding the existing automation pattern and replicating it for the new secrets sync feature, including creating multiple components and updating documentation.
brief_summary: The user wanted to automate daily secrets synchronization. Following the pattern of an existing cleanup job, Claude investigated the system, created a new executable script and a scheduler setup script, and integrated it into the main deployment script and project documentation.
